name: Gothitelle
description: The Astral Body Pokémon. They can predict the future from the placement and movement of the stars. They can see Trainers' life spans.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.description: Upon entering a battle, a single opponent’s held item is revealed, if it has one.

abilities.name: Competitive
abilities.description: This Pokémon adds its proficiency bonus to damage rolls while poisoned, burned, confused, or paralyzed.

abilities.name: Shadow Tag
abilities.description: Creatures within 50 feet of this Pokémon may not flee or switch out, except by item, Move, or ability.
